trans-unit.source: Implements the <c>GetFrameworkPath</c> task.
trans-unit.target: Implementa a tarefa <c>GetFrameworkPath</c>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <c>GetFrameworkPath</c> element in your project file to create and execute this task.
trans-unit.target: Use o elemento <c>GetFrameworkPath</c> em seu arquivo de projeto para criar e executar essa tarefa.

trans-unit.source: For usage and parameter information, see [GetFrameworkPath Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5b7bcdd7-d4a0-442d-af29-8aadb3b10598).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre uso e parâmetro, consulte [Tarefa GetFrameworkPath](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5b7bcdd7-d4a0-442d-af29-8aadb3b10598).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GetFrameworkPath" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GetFrameworkPath" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <see langword="true" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: There is no execution that takes place for the `GetFrameworkPath` task, instead the task supports only getting and setting of properties.
trans-unit.target: Não há nenhuma execução que ocorre para o `GetFrameworkPath` tarefa, em vez disso, a tarefa dá suporte somente obtenção e definição de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define caminho da pasta que contém os assemblies do [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1.

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: O caminho da pasta que contém o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1 assemblies.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define caminho da pasta que contém os assemblies do [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0.

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: O caminho da pasta que contém o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 assemblies.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.0 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define caminho da pasta que contém os assemblies do [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.0.

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.0 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: O caminho da pasta que contém o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.0 assemblies.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.5 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define caminho da pasta que contém os assemblies do [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.5.

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.5 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: O caminho da pasta que contém o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.5 assemblies.

trans-unit.source: Path to the v4.0 framework, if available
trans-unit.target: Caminho para a estrutura v4.0, se disponível

trans-unit.source: Path to the v4.5 framework, if available
trans-unit.target: Caminho para a estrutura v4.5, se disponível

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna <see cref="T:System.String" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the latest version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define caminho da pasta que contém a versão mais recente dos assemblies do [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder that contains the latest version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] assemblies.
trans-unit.target: O caminho da pasta que contém a versão mais recente do [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] assemblies.
